Description.EN: When held for a short while, toggles the visibility of Gulliver Mod menu.

(Y or N) If set to (Y)es, the following numpad hotkeys will work even when the mod's UI is hidden (mod must be enabled from the UI first, though): + (scale player up), - (scale player down), * [asterisk](reset player's scale). When Alt is held, selected entity's scale will be affected instead.
How long should the hotkey be held to show the mod's UI. This value is multiplied by 0.1 seconds.
Change the size of entities (including yourself) in the world. Press the configurable key (see Settings) for a short while to access the scale options.
